document_data.mainbody:
lduskryns Fiery Creations was a business in Kholtar, south Faer√ªn, circa the .
Elduskryns was located on the south side of Hael Way between Belphendors pipe fittings and Thalarmols crate-making service, not far from the southern gate of Kholtar (known as Farrgaunlar). Across the street was the sculpted mansion (called a klathlaaedin) named Anthormbrur that was the seat of the Horthander family.
Elduskryns produced various implements and works of metal in a forge.
